title: How TO - Google Font Pairings

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Google Font Pairings with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Great font pairings are essential to great design.
Popular Google Web Font Pairings
Google Fonts are free to use, and have more than 1000 fonts to choose from.
Below are some popular Google Web Font Pairings.
Merriweather and Open Sans
Example
Use the "Merriweather" font for headings, and "Open Sans" for text:
Beautiful Norway
Norway has a total area of 385,252 square kilometres and a population of 5,438,657 (December 2020). Norway is bordered by Sweeden, Finland and Russia to the north-east, and the Skagerrak to the south, with Denmark on the other side.
Norway has beautiful mountains, glaciers and stunning fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums. Bergen, with colorful wooden houses, is the starting point for cruises to the dramatic Sognefjord. Norway is also known for fishing, hiking and skiing.

Ubuntu and Lora
Example
Use the "Ubuntu" font for headings, and "Lora" for text:
Beautiful Norway
Norway has a total area of 385,252 square kilometres and a population of 5,438,657 (December 2020). Norway is bordered by Sweeden, Finland and Russia to the north-east, and the Skagerrak to the south, with Denmark on the other side.
Norway has beautiful mountains, glaciers and stunning fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums. Bergen, with colorful wooden houses, is the starting point for cruises to the dramatic Sognefjord. Norway is also known for fishing, hiking and skiing.

Example
Use the "Abril Fatface" font for headings, and "Poppins" for text:
Beautiful Norway
Norway has a total area of 385,252 square kilometres and a population of 5,438,657 (December 2020). Norway is bordered by Sweeden, Finland and Russia to the north-east, and the Skagerrak to the south, with Denmark on the other side.

Use the "Cinzel" font for headings, and "Fauna One" for text:

Use the "Fjalla One" font for headings, and "Libre Baskerville" for text:

Norway has beautiful mountains, glaciers and stunning fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums. Bergen, with colorful wooden houses, is the starting point for cruises to the dramatic Sognefjord. Norway is also known for fishing, hiking and skiing.

Example
Use the "Space Mono" font for headings, and "Muli" for text:
Beautiful Norway

Norway has beautiful mountains, glaciers and stunning fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums. Bergen, with colorful wooden houses, is the starting point for cruises to the dramatic Sognefjord. Norway is also known for fishing, hiking and skiing.

Spectral and Rubik
Example
Use the "Spectral" font for headings, and "Rubik" for text:
Beautiful Norway
Norway has a total area of 385,252 square kilometres and a population of 5,438,657 (December 2020). Norway is bordered by Sweeden, Finland and Russia to the north-east, and the Skagerrak to the south, with Denmark on the other side.
Norway has beautiful mountains, glaciers and stunning fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums. Bergen, with colorful wooden houses, is the starting point for cruises to the dramatic Sognefjord. Norway is also known for fishing, hiking and skiing.

Oswald and Noto Sans
Example
Use the "Oswald" font for headings, and "Noto Sans" for text:
Beautiful Norway
Norway has a total area of 385,252 square kilometres and a population of 5,438,657 (December 2020). Norway is bordered by Sweeden, Finland and Russia to the north-east, and the Skagerrak to the south, with Denmark on the other side.
Norway has beautiful mountains, glaciers and stunning fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums. Bergen, with colorful wooden houses, is the starting point for cruises to the dramatic Sognefjord. Norway is also known for fishing, hiking and skiing.

For a list of all free Google Fonts, visit our
How To - Google Fonts Tutorial
.

★
+1

quiz.question:
What is Google Font Pairings

Great font pairings?
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of Google Font Pairings

Great font pairings is 'essential to great design'.

quiz.question:
What is Popular Google Web Font Pairings
Google Fonts?
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of Popular Google Web Font Pairings
Google Fonts is 'free to use'.

summary: This tutorial covers How TO - Google Font Pairings concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use How TO - Google Font Pairings effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of How TO - Google Font Pairings and how to apply it in your projects.
